intro: Argyrolobium trifoliatum, commonly known as the three-leaf silver globular veldt. It is a flowering plant native to southern Africa, characterized by its spherical, silver-gray foliage and small, yellow flowers. The plant belongs to the Fabaceae family, which includes legumes, and it has a sprawling growth habit. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in grassland environments. Its unique appearance and drought tolerance make it a distinctive ornamental plant.
